short_description: Enjoy a day in Antiquonia helping Sarah to remeber how she got there. In this classic point-and-click adventure, Sarah has to unravel the puzzle of her past as she explores the town where the Internet is not welcome. A beautiful adventure with high-resolution 2D graphics and a lovely soundtrack.
